title: Recall animation
body:
Hey! I was wondering if there is any possible way to turn off the blue circle that circle's you when you recall? I know that ARAM doesn't have the blue circle but I was interested in making a cinematic specifically on the rift. I know riot has turned of the blue circle in several of their skin spotlights, is this feature just for riot or anyone interested?

Blue circle example: https://www.google.ca/search?q=lol+recall&source=lnms&tbm=isch&sa=X&ved=0ahUKEwiI3IfzsNPWAhUD5oMKHRpkDWQQ_AUICigB&biw=1920&bih=974#imgrc=KpsEguHNBPPKJM:

-Thanks!

replies.body: I actually don't think there's an option to disable the recall animations at all =\ .

Ok cool! Only riot has that option I guess.
To clarify I meant the blue circle that surrounds you when you recall not the champion moving when it recalls.
